title: Assemble Project Closeout Package
description: At the end of a project, a project engineer must assemble the final closeout package for the client, including all warranties and O&M manuals.

tasks.description: Request all final warranty documents from the major equipment suppliers (e.g., HVAC, roofing).
tasks.expected_outcome: Warranty documents are requested from all relevant vendors.

tasks.description: Request all Operations & Maintenance (O&M) manuals from the subcontractors.
Compile all received warranties, O&M manuals, and as-built drawings into a single, organized closeout package.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete and organized closeout package is assembled.
